mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ttmt_movie (movie_name, movie_alias, cover_url, douban_score, movie_mins, languages, regions, release_time, created_time, updated_time, storyline) values (#{movieName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{movieAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doubanScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{movieMins,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{languages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{storyline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ttmt_movie set movie_name = #{movieName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, movie_alias = #{movieAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, douban_score = #{doubanScore,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, movie_mins = #{movieMins,jdbcType=INTEGER}, languages = #{languages,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regions = #{regions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, release_time = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, storyline = #{storyline,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, movie_name, movie_alias, cover_url, douban_score, movie_mins, languages, regions, release_time, created_time, updated_time, storyline from ttmt_movie where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, movie_name, movie_alias, cover_url, douban_score, movie_mins, languages, regions, release_time, created_time, updated_time, storyline from ttmt_movie
